forgeLabs.problem: Healthcare workers miss critical safety alerts buried in EHR interfaces, leading to preventable adverse events. Current alert systems are noisy and don't prioritize effectively.
forgeLabs.solution: Chrome extension that overlays intelligent safety alerts on any EHR interface using FDA MedWatch data + ISMP safety bulletins. Smart prioritization based on patient context (age, allergies, current meds).
forgeLabs.moat: Real-time FDA MedWatch API integration + ISMP safety bulletin parsing. Most competitors focus on drug interactions, not safety alerts.
forgeLabs.dataSource: FDA MedWatch RSS feeds, ISMP safety bulletins, Joint Commission sentinel event alerts, Health Canada advisories
forgeLabs.competitionCheck: Chrome Web Store has basic drug checkers but no real-time safety alert overlays. Clear gap.
forgeLabs.deployTo: Chrome Web Store initially, then Edge, Firefox. Potential Teams app for hospital IT depts.
forgeLabs.monetization: $9.99/month per user, freemium model with basic alerts free, advanced prioritization paid
forgeLabs.confidence: High - real pain point, underserved data source, fast deployment path
